title: Sucker Punch Speaks On Infamous & Sly Cooper - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.01.22
description:
Blessing and IGN's Rebekah Valentine talk about Sucker Punch's comments about Infamous & Sly Cooper, Nintendo not making the games you want, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Intro
00:07:24 - Housekeeping
00:14:07- Nobody’s working on a new Infamous nor Sly Cooper - Press Release from Sucker Punch
00:27:12 - Nintendo Says It's 'Difficult' to Make All the Sequels You Ask For
00:32:27 -  Bethesda Keeps Offering Jobs to Fallout London Modders
00:40:06 - Riders Republic and Skull & Bones in-game events will highlight climate issues
00:46:55 -  4 new Sega Genesis games come to Nintendo Switch Online - Michael McWhertor
00:54:51 - Another edition of: Let me buy this Xbox
00:59:03 - Out Today & You're Wrong
01:03:04 - Post ShowNext Week's Hosts
MON: We’re off for American independence day
TUES:  Greg and Gary
WED: ??? and Janet
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Bless
